Articles.Content:
Hey I was wondering. I know there are people doing challenges with FAR and BD where people can submit fighters in but are there any non FAR challenges like that out there?

Sorry if this is not the place to ask

Not really the place no, but there's at least this one: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/130238-Top-Gun-AI-The-Official-Tournament-Thread

I'm only involved in the FAR thread so I have no idea how well it's running, but it looks active. I also don't build stock aero craft so I've not checked any others.
